entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 17.
